Kashira:
Otoko chū koyaku (男中子役)

Category: Child

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Teachings for Women (Imoseyama onna teikin / 妹背山婦女庭訓)

The Cruel Employer (Yura no minamoto sengen chōja / 由良湊千軒長者)

Kajiwara The Swordsman (Miura no Ōsuke kōbai Tazuna / 三浦大助紅梅たづな)

The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags (Katakiuchi tsuzure no nishiki / 敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

Kiichi's Book of Strategy (Kiichi Hōgen sanryaku no maki / 鬼一法眼三略巻)

The Double Suicide at Ikudama (Ikudama shinjū / 生玉心中)

The Murder in Revenge (Kunikotoba kudoki ondo / 国言詢音頭)

The Twins and the Sumida River (Futago Sumidagawa / 雙生隅田川)
